mapper.select: select aRecId from alarmrecord where isAlarming = 1
select alarmTime,isConfirm,isAlarmed from alarmrecord where aRecId = #{aRecId}
select mpt.mptName, arec.alarmTime, arec.optLattitude, arec.optLongtitude, arec.optHeight, arec.isConfirm from alarmrecord arec, monitorpoint mpt where arec.mptId = mpt.mptId and arec.isAlarming = 1

select mpt.mptName, arec.aRecId, arec.alarmTime, arec.optLattitude, arec.optLongtitude, arec.optHeight, arec.isConfirm, arec.name, arec.phone from alarmrecord arec, monitorpoint mpt where arec.mptId = mpt.mptId and arec.isConfirm = 1
select mpt.mptName, arec.alarmTime, arec.optLattitude, arec.optLongtitude, arec.optHeight, arec.isConfirm from alarmrecord arec, monitorpoint mpt where arec.mptId = mpt.mptId and arec.isConfirm = 2
select mpt.mptName, arec.alarmTime, arec.optLattitude, arec.optLongtitude, arec.optHeight, arec.isConfirm from alarmrecord arec, monitorpoint mpt where arec.mptId = mpt.mptId and arec.isConfirm = -1
mapper.update: update alarmrecord set isAlarming = 1 where aRecId = #{aRecId}
